health_tech: FHIR APIs for health data integration
integration_patterns: Batch data processing via AWS services

evidence.claim: EverCheck utilizes AWS services for their cloud infrastructure.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, suitable for handling sensitive health information.
EverCheck integrates with various EHR systems using FHIR APIs.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA compliant systems and X12 EDI transactions; relevant tech stack and use cases identified.
